analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/46/0x3e5dd078b2cdc9a202cec8875efae59a324373f8.sol:
	Contract KMRCTToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/46/0x3e5dd078b2cdc9a202cec8875efae59a324373f8.sol#214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/46/0x3e5dd078b2cdc9a202cec8875efae59a324373f8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/46/0x3e5dd078b2cdc9a202cec8875efae59a324373f8.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/46/0x3e5dd078b2cdc9a202cec8875efae59a324373f8.sol#82) is not in mixedCase
